Revolutionize Health IT

SMART is a universal platform that supports medical applications development and deployment accross a wide range of health records systems.
Get Started Now! 
            
SMART.get_medications().success(
  function(response){
    $.each(response.objects.of_type.Medication, function(i, med){
      document.write(med.drugName.dcterms__title + "<br/>");
    })
});
